sentences.en: "What about Sunday evening at Frank's?" — "Sure. What time?"
sentences.cn: “周日晚上在弗兰克家怎么样？”——“好啊，几点？”

sentences.en: Frank Deford is a special correspondent for Newsweek magazine.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克·德福特是《新闻周刊》杂志的特派记者。

sentences.en: Frank didn't like having the cops know where to find him.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克不想让警察知道去哪里可以找到他。

sentences.en: Frank had been struck down by a massive heart attack.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克的身体已经被一场严重的心脏病拖垮了。

sentences.en: Frank is of the opinion that the 1934 yacht should have won.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克认为本该是那艘1934年的帆船获胜。

sentences.en: Frank Mariano negotiates the desert terrain in his battered pickup.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克·马里亚诺驾驶他那辆破烂不堪的皮卡车成功穿越了沙漠地带。

sentences.en: Frank took a large ring of keys from his pocket.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克从口袋里掏出一大串钥匙。

sentences.en: Frank was in full flight when he reached them.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克正在拼命奔逃，这时他联系到了他们。

sentences.en: Frank was there and he is a perfect peach.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克在那儿，他是个非常可爱的人。

sentences.en: He had worked alongside Frank and Mark and they had become friends.
sentences.cn: 他与弗兰克和马克一起工作过，并且成了朋友。

sentences.en: He was completely frank with her about what happened.
sentences.cn: 对于发生的一切，他都对她坦言相告。

sentences.en: I know Frank will be delighted to see you.
sentences.cn: 我知道弗兰克见到你会很高兴的。

sentences.en: If you'll bear with me, Frank, just let me try to explain.
sentences.cn: 你要对我有点儿耐心，弗兰克，让我跟你解释。

sentences.en: The rawness of his greed was frank and uninhibited.
sentences.cn: 他的贪婪是赤裸裸的，干脆直接，毫不掩饰。

sentences.en: To be frank with you, Harvey, I may have made a mistake.
sentences.cn: 老实跟你讲，哈维，我可能犯了个错。

sentences.en: To be frank, he could also be a bit of a bore.
sentences.cn: 老实说，他有时也会让人厌烦。

sentences.en: To be perfectly frank, I think it’s a bad idea.
sentences.cn: 老实说，我认为这个主意不好。

phrases.tran_cn: 跟你老实说；坦白跟你讲
弗兰克·兰帕德（英国足球明星）
法兰克辛纳屈（美国歌手及演员）
说实话；老实说；坦率地说

trans.tran_cn: 坦白的，直率的，清楚表明的，明显的
免费寄（邮件），盖免费邮寄公章，盖邮戳，便于使（人）自由地来往
